entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Southend Reindeer
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:18 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -18.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Southend 03:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023
Temperature: -18.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -20.4°C
Wind: NE 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight then snow. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 17 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to light snow near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Clearing. High minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 26. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 31. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023
